category: National Sports Competition Regulations/Article 17 (Term of office of members)
contents: Article 17 (Term of office of committee members) ① The term of office of committee members shall be two years, but shall not be based on the number of days but shall be based on the regular general meeting of the Sports Association. In this case, the expiration date of the term is the day before the regular general meeting. However, in accordance with Article 15, Paragraph 2, the term of office of the members recommended by the head of the member city/provincial sports association where the competition is held shall be until December 31 of the year in which the National Sports Festival of the relevant city/province is held. Revised 2019. 1. 31., 2022. 1. 24. 2023. 3. 23 ② The term of office of the by-elected members shall be the remaining term of office of the predecessor. Newly established 2019. 1. 31., 2022. 1. 24.
